author: Daniel Wiessner
title: EEOC general counsel nominee dodges Democrats' questions on LGBT bias
text:
President Donald Trumpâ€™s nominee for general counsel of the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission on Tuesday refused to tell U.S. senators whether she believes that discriminating against LGBT workers is a form of unlawful sex bias.
Sharon Fast Gustafson told the Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions Committee during a confirmation hearing that employees should only be judged by their work, but declined to give her opinion on whether Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 prohibits anti-LGBT bias.
